description.title: JavaScript Calculator
description.content: A calculator written with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

description.title: Morse Code Generator
description.content: A translator for converting between English and Morse code. Written HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

description.title: Brainfunk interpreter
description.content: An interpreter for programs written in the esoteric language Brainfunk.

description.title: Google Books Search
description.content: A search front-end using Google Books' search API.

description.title: React eStore
description.content: A mock ecommerce store using the React.js front-end framework, and firestore for the database backend.

description.title: Sudoku Solver
description.content: A graphical interface for solving Sudoku puzzles.

description.title: Java Wordle
description.content: A Java command line application for playing Wordle.

description.title: Python Webserver
description.content: A Python webserver allowing for additions of custom web modules. Using the HTTPServer module for functionality and unittest module for automated testing.

description.title: React File Server
description.content: ReactJS front-end built for the Python File Server module.

description.title: Spring Resourcing API
description.content: A Resourcing API using the Java Spring Boot framework, that allows consumers to assign temps to jobs.

description.title: UniSA Membership Verification
description.content: A verification tool for membership's emails that informs the club of a member's current status.

description.title: Petrol Price Viewer
description.content: Shows petrol prices around Adeliade, South Australia using the SAFPIS.

description.title: Python Web IDE
description.content: A short training tool for python that introduces users to basic programming.

description.title: UniSA Booking Register
description.content: A tool that allows a user to register for when they are participating with the club. Uses AWS Lambda and DynamoDB for storing session data.
